Test Name: Helicobacter pylori with Clarithromycin Resistance Prediction (PCR, Feces)
Purpose: Detection of Helicobacter pylori and prediction of clarithromycin resistance using PCR in fecal specimens.
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, DNA extraction kit, Helicobacter pylori clarithromycin resistance PCR kit, vortex mixer, centrifuge
